data.title: Central Michigan University
data.meta_description: Trevor Jones (70) OL - 2022 As a redshirt freshman offensive lineman, played in two games … saw action in 15 plays on special teams on the year … played in t...
data.text:
2022

As a redshirt freshman offensive lineman, played in two games … saw action in 15 plays on special teams on the year … played in the Ball State (10/8) and Bucknell (9/17) games.

2021

Redshirted first year at Central Michigan … did not appear in any games.

HIGH SCHOOL

A 2021 graduate of Lincoln High School in Ypsilanti, Mich., where he played football for Head Coach Chris Westfall … earned All-Region recognition from the Michigan High School Football Coaches Association in 2020 … two-time first team all-conference offensive lineman (2020 and 2021) … ranked No. 53 on the Detroit News Blue Chip List … totaled 17 pancake blocks … led the way for a 1,000-yard rusher … had three sacks on defense … as a junior, selected to the Ann Arbor Dream Team and earned first team all-conference honors … three-star recruit by 247sports.

PERSONAL

Born Trevor Jones on June 29, 2003 … son of Jennifer Jones and Casey Jones.
